title: Dodging leads to End of promotion?

embed.description: I dodge a queue because the lobby was filled with trolls and then I see this message - 9GAG has the best funny pics, gifs, videos, gaming, anime, manga, movie, tv, cosplay, sport, food, memes, cute, fail, wtf photos on the internet!

body:
To be honest I am looking for a Rioters reply on this one.
I am in sliver 3 and was in promos for silver 2 with one win and one loss.
I was going Teemo so you could call me a troll but I am finding good win rate with Teemo. I cannot say I got trolls in the lobby but I had Shaco Jungle, Nasus Mid, Yasuo ADC, and Vel'koz Support. Sure, all of them are good champions but I was not sure how they would do in their respective roles cause it was just silver and I thought that was going to risk my promos so I dodged that queue and then it ended my promos. I am so disappointed, we don't lose LP if we dodge in ranked games then why do we have to lose promos which is even more important, this is so frustrating.

replies.body:
You do actually lose LP in addition to the normal queue lockout. Dodging has always resulted in a promo loss (for as long as I can remember at least) and it is stated in the FAQ: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging

>#Penalties

 >   **Solo/Flex Ranked Queue**
   >     1 queue dodge: 6 minute queue penalty. Lose 3 LP.
     >   2+ queue dodges: 30 minute queue penalty. Lose 10 LP.
...
Dodging in any promotional series will count as a loss. The series will end if it is the determining loss.
